description:
spec: Update the description of string type behaviour.

The previous text implied that passing string values would result in
copying the underlying data, while in fact a string behaves more like
a slice.

messages.text:
If you do want to be added,
please complete a CLA as described at
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

Thanks.
Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, kemp@google.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

This is a nice correction but very tiny. I'd be happy to make this change for you and avoid adding you to the CONTRIBUTORS list, but if you want to be added, that's fine too.

-rob

On Mon, Feb 13, 2012 at 12:08 AM, Rob 'Commander' Pike <r@google.com> wrote:
> This is a nice correction but very tiny. I'd be happy to make this change for you and avoid adding you to the CONTRIBUTORS list, but if you want to be added, that's fine too.

Sure, that'd be great.  We can save adding me to CONTRIBUTORS for
something more substantial :)

Aaron

subject: code review 5649071: spec: Update the description of string type behaviour.
